Sentence: name "military reform"/>

Title: Key elements of reform included reducing armed forces to a strength of one million
Sentence: centralising officer training from 65 military schools into 10 'systemic' military training centres
column4: creating a professional Non commissioned officer NCO corps
column5: reducing size of central command
column6: introducing more civilian logistics and auxiliary staff
column7: elimination of cadre strength formations
column8: reorganising reserves
column9: reorganising army into a brigade system
column10: and reorganising air forces into an airbase system instead of regiments.
